A0: Vienna -LRB- Alliance News -RRB- - Despite three days of intensive negotiations , Iran and the six world powers
RelatedSentence: Vienna ( Alliance News ) - Despite three days of intensive negotiations , Iran and the six world powers failed to achieve progress in nuclear talks that concluded Friday in Vienna .
The talks were held in a constructive atmosphere and free of any tensions , but no tangible progress was achieved , Iran 's deputy foreign minister Abbas Araqchi said at the end of the talks .
The US said that there were still several critical issues to be settled between Iran and the P5+1 , which consists of the five permanent members of the UN Security Council plus Germany .
Washington has said that no agreement is better than a bad agreement .
The two sides were seeking to prepare a draft for a Comprehensive Plan of Action ( CPA ) , which is supposed to end the ten - year - long dispute over Iran 's controversial nuclear programme .
